constituent: hinge, tree, wood, ward, box, sheaf
koohiiStory1: Make sure you install the hinge the right way. If it opens treeward (= tree ward), you won't be able to get the fence open, make sure it opens houseward.
koohiiStory2: You notice a hinge on a tree and realize there´s a secret door. You open it up to find an Xbox!!!
words: 中枢(ちゅうすう): centre, pivot, mainstay, nucleus, backbone, central figure, pillar, key man
